item.title: Patrick Murray-John on "How can I change my DHanswers profile picture?"
item.dc:creator: Patrick Murray-John
item.description:
The images showing up are called Gravatars (Globally Recognized Avatars). You can sign up for an account at http://en.gravatar.com/ . Then, upload your image there, and it will appear on any site that uses gravatars. WordPress and Drupal have plugins, and so you'll see them frequently in the blogosphere.

HTH
Patrick

item.title: Jennifer Vinopal on "How can I change my DHanswers profile picture?"

item.description: In my "edit profile" settings I can't see how to edit my profile picture. TIA!
